all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Take upon you the name of Christ, and speak the truth in soberness.
Doctrine and Covenants 18:21
Quote of the Day
"We must not be guilty of … simplistic versions of [Jesus] that conveniently ignore teachings we find uncomfortable."
Jeffrey R. Holland | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
